name: Basic Tank Game
description:
A basic tank game that can be played with two players

enter is an alternative to the fire button

use numpad to input values

esc to pause the game and exit match/reset map

reset only resets the map, but not the scores (exit to main menu and start to start a new match)

Made in Unity
